remarks.para: Except for ER operations beyond 120 minutes, one probe heater may be inoperative provided aircraft is not operated in visible moisture, or in known or forecast icing conditions.

note.para: No flight in visible moisture, or in known or forecast icing conditions.

numlitem.para: Operations in visible moisture, or in known or forecast icing conditions prohibited.

placard.para: Placard near Probe Heat Lights "_______ PROBE HEAT INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
